title: How data is transmitted on the Internet

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains how data is transmitted on the Internet?

choices.label: Data is broken into packets, which are all sent to the recipient in a specified order along the same path.
Data is broken into packets, which can be sent along different paths.
All data is transmitted in a single packet through a direct connection between the sender and the recipient.
Multiple data files are bundled together in a packet and transmitted together.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Explain how computing systems work.
